name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and deploying applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Golang**, SQL, and data warehousing technologies, with hands-on expertise in building robust APIs and implementing clean code principles. Equipped with knowledge of messaging systems such as **Nats** and **Kafka**, and experience in blockchain technologies and **EVM**. 
Skilled in **AWS** for cloud services, with a strong understanding of monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. Committed to agile methodologies and testing practices for delivering high-quality software solutions. Additionally, well-versed in developing high-performance applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in AI/ML platforms, compliance-driven development including HIPAA and PCI DSS standards, and MLOps orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
